title: CHAMP SELECT IS NOT SHOWING ANY CHAMPIONS
body: First started loading the game and noticed that it was taking forever to load into the client. I got to champion select (doesn't matter if it is draft/blind/ranked/) and it does not show any champions on my screen...help!

replies.body: Im having the same problem and now i have the dodge queue timer

It sounds like your connection might be pretty unstable, if it's delaying your transition to champ select and failing to load assets.  Run through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, making sure to go over each step to troubleshoot.  Test it out in a custom game so you don't face any penalties.  I'm here to help, so let me know if you have any questions.

Hello there,

I personally have a very stable connection. However, this doesn't seem to be issue that triggers the bug, or whatever it is. When I join the lobby for a game, I can't see any champions. Additionally, when I go to my champions, and go under the "owned" section, I have none. It appears that every champion is locked for me, and I have no idea why! Please help!

Thank you

You can still have issues reaching specific services regardless of how good your internet is.  Content appearing as locked or assets not showing up at all suggests a failure to download assets or stay in sync after transitioning from pvp.net to champion select.  Your best bet would be to go through each step of the guide to make sure nothing is degrading your connection during that time.
